comments.body:
If it is not required, you don't need to state `required: False`. That's implicit.
It is easier to see which parameters are required if those only have `required: True`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@    - This works by C(dependency_action) to either add/remove or set the
      services in this list.
    required: False
    version_added: "2.3"
  dependency_action:
